chargeHist.descr: Harboring/Aiding a Felon (A/B/C/D or unclassified felony/life)

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: It is hereby ordered that the Defendant's Motion to Modify Bail is granted.

Zoom appearances.
Court modifies the condition of bail to allow contact between Stephanie Neuser and Michale Kreisle.  The contact shall be limited to matters unrelated to this pending felony matter.
Attorney  Barth to draft the order.

Order for Prints.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of felony bail jumping.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 04-25-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 1.  Bail is set at $5,000.00 recognizance bond with the condition that she have no contact with Michael Kreisle.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody. Court orders photos and prints at TRPD.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of neglecting a child, obstruct officer and harbor/aid felon.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 04-11-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 1.  Bail is set at $10,000.00 recognizance bond with the condition that she have no contact with Michael J. Kreisle and no contact with children S.N., DOB: 07-30-2018, K.N., DOB: 08-11-2014 and A.D., DOB: 09-2-2010 unless approved by Manitowoc County Child Protective Services.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody. Court orders photos and prints at TRPD.
